item.title: [PI] Timers! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

[code]
if (inDeadWait()) {
if (waitTimer > 15) {
waitTimer–;
} else if (waitTimer == 15) {
startGame();
}
} else if (waitTimer > 15) {
waitTimer–;
} else if (waitTimer == 15) {
endGame();
}

	   if (inUndeadWait()) {
		if (waitTimer > 15) {
                            waitTimer--;
                    } else if (waitTimer == 15) {
                            startGame();
                    }
            } else if (waitTimer > 150000) {
                    waitTimer--;
            } else if (waitTimer == 150000) {
                    endGame();
            }
		[/code]

public void startGame() { getPA().movePlayer(2774, 9490, 0); sendMessage("The Dead vs Undead Game has started!"); } public void endGame() { getPA().movePlayer(3093, 3493, 0); sendMessage("The Dead vs Undead Game is over!"); getItems().addItem(4278, 10); sendMessage("You have been rewarded 10 Ecto Tokens for your effort!"); }

Can someone tell me what’s wrong with these codes?

They won’t start a timer and teleport me to where I want:/

Read full topic
